properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued February 16 at 4:12AM AST until February 19 at 6:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH
WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON...

* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected.

* WHERE...Beaches of northwest Puerto Rico.

* WHEN...From Monday morning through Wednesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IS CANCELLED
